co.cask.cdap.api.dataset.lib.partitioned

Class KVTableStatePersistor

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.cask.cdap.api.dataset.lib.partitioned.KVTableStatePersistor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DatasetStatePersistor

    public class KVTableStatePersistor
extends Object
implements DatasetStatePersistor
    An implementation of DatasetStatePersistor that uses a row of a KeyValueTable for persistence.

    • Method Detail

      • readState

        public byte[] readState(DatasetContext datasetContext)
        Specified by:
        readState in interface DatasetStatePersistor
        Parameters:
        datasetContext - context to use to instantiate dataset(s) for reading the state
        Returns:
        the serialized bytes of the state of the partition consuming process; return null to indicate a fresh state of consuming (defaults to starting from the beginning).

      • persistState

        public void persistState(DatasetContext datasetContext,
                byte[] state)
        Description copied from interface: DatasetStatePersistor
        Writes the serialized bytes of the state of the partition consuming process. The bytes written in this method should be available in the following call to readBytes(DatasetContext).
        Specified by:
        persistState in interface DatasetStatePersistor
        Parameters:
        datasetContext - context to use to instantiate dataset(s) for persisting the state
        state - the bytes to persist
